Class List
Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
AbstractAppenderAbstract base class for writing a log entries
AbstractStringAppenderConvinient base for appenders working with plain text formatted logs
ConsoleAppenderConsoleAppender is the simple appender that writes the log records to the std::cerr output stream
FileAppenderFile is the simple appender that writes the log records to the plain text file
LoggerVery simple but rather powerful component which may be used for logging your application activities
OutputDebugAppenderOutputDebugAppender is the appender that writes the log records to the Microsoft Debug Log
